title: Optically compatible infrared camouflage performance of ITO ink
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,17355-17363
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02784A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Xiao Feifei, Xu Weidong, Liu Heng, Li Hao, Yu Haibao, Hao Bentian
Doping In2O3 with Sn atoms can obtain ITO. When the doping rate of Sn atoms is 9.375%, ITO has high reflectivity in the infrared band, and high transmittance in the visible light band, which can realize optically compatible infrared camouflage.
